A local leader in the global display industry -delivering excellence in customer service through world-class PersonalTech.

ABOUT US

A manufacturing company in the Philippines with 25 years of expertise. A subsidiary of JDI (Japan Display Incorporated).

Our reputation spans the globe for pioneering cutting edge small and medium sized LCDs.

Adapting to diverse client demands, we offer electronic manufacturing services (EMS), and comprehensive manufacturing solutions.

WHAT WE DO

"We offer Electronics Manufacturing Services (EMS) with outstanding QCD performance, collaborating for your company's success."

MANUFACTURING PROCESS OUTSOURCING

- Small to Medium-sized display and product solutionsAssembly.

- Product inspection accuracy.

- Superior product rework performance.

- Research and development of related products.

FACILITY AND INFORMATION SERVICES

- ISO 7 Cleanrooom (Class 10,000).

- Related Equipment and Jigs Maintenance.

- Automated Manufacturing services.

- Facilities rental, warehousing, and leasing service.

- Advance information management systems.

PRODUCT FAILURE ANALYSIS AND TESTING

- X-ray Energy Disperse Analysis.

- Accelerated Aging Test.

- Non Destructive Reliability Test.

- Electrostatic Discharge Test.

- High-end Miscroscopic Analysis.

PERSONNEL TRAINING

- Competetive inspection processes.

- Strong work methodology and industrial technique mastery

- Reliable manufacturing-engineering approach training competencies.
